markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dustsoul](/Feats.aspx?ID=2565) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
<trait label="Oread" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=304" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 106 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your [earth elemental](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=42) ancestor's influence manifests in you as dust and dirt, like the soil of a field or the hot desert sands. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16). If you would automatically become trained in Survival (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You can sustain yourself on dirt and ash instead of normal food and water.
name: Dustsoul
